description: Synology Surveillance Station is a security solution for homes and businesses that provides video-monitoring capabilities. One of the features of the Surveillance Station is the ability to download video recorded by cameras and saved in the cloud to a Surveillance Station client installed on a user's computer.

When a user downloads a video recording from Synology's cloud storage, the Surveillance Station installation on the user's computer creates the SVSDOWNLOAD file as a placeholder in the user's downloads folder.
